errors.no_hex_data: The provided string doesn't look like hex data

titles.ready: Your account is ready to receive transactions!

descriptions.mnemonic_first_transaction: Your first transaction will commit your new address to the blockchain. This process may take some time until you are all set to send and delegate.
descriptions.first_transaction_confirmation: We have received your first transaction of {{formattedAmount}} tez! Preparing your account now, this might take a while.

actionPanel.description: It's pretty empty here. Get started<1> sending</1> and<3> receiving</3> tez from this address.
actionPanel.empty-title: You have not made any transactions yet

addDelegateModal.gas_tool_tip: {{gas}} xtz is required by the network to create a delegated address
addDelegateModal.warning2: Manager Addresses are not yet allowed to have less than 1 µtz

interactModal.title: Interact with Smart Contracts
interactModal.paste_micheline_code: Paste in your smart contract {{format}} code

descriptions.description1: Delegating tez is not the same as sending tez. Only baking rights are transferred when setting a delegate. The delegate that you set cannot spend your tez.
descriptions.description2: There is a fee for setting a delegate.
descriptions.description3: It takes 7 cycles (~20 days) for your tez to start contributing to baking.
descriptions.description4: Delegation rewards will depend on your arrangement with the delegate.

addressBlock.not_ready_tooltip: Your account is not ready to delegate.
addressBlock.not_ready_interact_tooltip: Your account is not ready to interact with contracts.

balanceBanner.do_not_store: Do not store your secret key on your computer. Write it down and keep in a safe place.

descriptions.description1: Write down your seed phrase on a piece of paper and keep it in a safe place. You will need your seed phrase to recover your account.
descriptions.description2: Make sure to keep your seed phrase in a safe place. If you forget your seed phrase, you will not be able to recover your account. We do not store your seed phrase and cannot help you recover it if you lose it.
descriptions.description3: In order to ensure that you wrote down up your seed phrase, please type in the following four seed words.

createAccountSlide.seed_backup: Your Tezos account seed is backed up!

errors.typo_error: It's a typo! Please check again

delegate.delegate_warning: Your delegate settings will not show up until confirmed on the blockchain.

delegateConfirmationModal.delegate_warning: Your delegation change will not show up until the change is confirmed on the blockchain.

changeDelegationLedgerConfirmModal.change_description: You are about to send out an delegation operation to change your delegate. Please carefully review the details on your device.

delegationLedgerConfirmationModal.confirm_delegate_title: Confirm Adding a Delegate to Account 1
delegationLedgerConfirmationModal.add_description: You are about to send out an origination operation to add a delegate. Please carefully review the details on your device.
delegationLedgerConfirmationModal.confirm_description: If all the details are correct, please<1> confirm </1>the origination on your device.

invokeLedgerConfirmationModal.invoke_description: You are about to invoke a smart contract function. Please carefully review the details on your device.
invokeLedgerConfirmationModal.invoke_alt_description_2: Please note that Ledger Nano S devices are not yet capable of parsing parameters. It is expected that you will see above message instead of operation details.
invokeLedgerConfirmationModal.invoke_confirm: If all the details are correct, please<1> confirm </1>the invocation on your device.
invokeLedgerConfirmationModal.invoke_alt_confirm: Please<1> confirm </1>the invocation on your device at your own risk.

deployLedgerConfirmationModal.deploy_description_2: Please note that Ledger Nano S devices are not yet capable of parsing scripts or parameters. It is expected that you will see above message instead of operation details.
deployLedgerConfirmationModal.deploy_confirm: Please<1> confirm </1>the deployment on your device at your own risk.

fees.required_minium_fee: Please keep in mind that the minimum required fee for this transaction is<1> <0>{{fee}}</0> XTZ</1>.
fees.minimum_fee_error: Your custom fee is below Tezos network minimal fee.

contents.content1: You can always change the delegate at a later time.
contents.content2: There is a fee for changing the delegate.
contents.content3: You can only delegate to the Manager Address. Manager Addresses always starts with TZ1, TZ2 or TZ3.

errors.send_address: Addresses can only start TZ1, TZ2, TZ3 or KT1
errors.delegate_address: You can only delegate to TZ1, TZ2 or TZ3 addresses.
errors.special_chars: Addresses cannot contain any special characters.
errors.send_funds: You cannot send funds to yourself.
errors.invoke_address: Smart Contract addresses can only start with KT1
errors.not_exist: This account doesn't exist or has 0 balance
errors.not_smartcontract: This is a delegated address and not a smart contract. Please use send tab to transfer funds.
errors.use_interact: This is a smart contract address. Please use interact with contracts button to transfer funds.

languageSelectModal.language_selection_description: You can always change your language selection in the settings.

messages.address_begin: Address must begin with tz1 or KT1.
messages.pass_not_empty: Pass Phrase must not be empty.
messages.pass_length_8: Pass Phrase must be at least 8 characters.
messages.cant_sent_yourself: You cannot send funds to yourself.

restoreBackup.seed_encrypted_label: This seed phrase is encrypted with a password

errors.invalid_length: Seed phrases must contain no more than 15 words.
errors.invalid_words: Detected invalid word(s). Please double check.

securityNoticeModal.understand_check: I understand that this operation may result in a loss of funds.
securityNoticeModal.dont_message: Don’t show this message again (not recommended).
securityNoticeModal.notice_content: It looks like you are not running a local Tezos node. It's perfectly fine to use a hosted node. However, if the Tezos node is compromised, you might end up losing your funds.

send.burn_tooltip_title: Why is there a burn fee?
send.burn_tooltip_content: The recipient address you entered has a zero balance. Sending funds to an empty Manager address (tz1,2,3) requires a one-time<1> 0.257 </1>XTZ burn fee.
send.fee_tooltip_title: Why are fees a bit higher for this transaction?
send.fee_tooltip_content: This address is not revealed on the blockchain. We have added<1> 0.001300 XTZ </1>for Public Key Reveal to your regular send operation fee.

warnings.not_allowed: Manager Addresses are not yet allowed to have less than 1 µtz

sendConfirmationModal.send_description: You are about to send out a transaction. Please carefully review the details.
sendConfirmationModal.confirm_question: Do you confirm that you want to send

sendLedgerConfirmationModal.send_description: You are about to send out a transaction. Please carefully review the details on your device.
sendLedgerConfirmationModal.confirm_description: If the all the details are correct, please<1> confirm </1>the transaction on your device.

termsModal.description: Before we get started, please read our<1> Terms of Service </1>and<3> Privacy Policy</3>.

tooltips.manager_tooltips_description: The Manager Address is the primary address of your account and can be used to send and receive tez.

versionStatus.version_update: You are using an older version of Galleon, which might not be fully functional. Please download v{{version}} at

comingSoon.working_hard: We are working hard on making this page.

withdrawDeposit.withdraw_warning: Transfer balance to the manager account at {{managerAddress}}.
withdrawDeposit.deposit_warning: Transfer balance from the manager account at {{managerAddress}}

homeAddAddress.refer_pdf_title: Please refer to the PDF document that you created during the Fundraiser.

tooltips.password_tooltip: This is the password that you used when generating a Tezos paper wallet to participate in the Fundraiser.
tooltips.email_tooltip: This is the email address that you used when generating a Tezos paper wallet to participate in the Fundraiser
tooltips.activation_code_tooltip: This is the activation code that you received after completing the KYC/AML process. An activation code corresponds to a public key hash and is required if you participated in the Fundraiser. You may complete the process at <1>verification.tezos.com</1> if you have not done so already.
tooltips.public_key_hash_tooltip: This is the public key hash as provided in the paper wallet.

errors.invalid_length: Seed phrases must contain no more than 15 words.
errors.invalid_words: Detected invalid word(s). Please double check.

loginHome.description: I acknowledge that I have read and accepted the<1> Terms of Service </1>and<3> Privacy Policy</3>.
loginHome.want_to_import_fundraiser_paper_wallet: Want to import your Fundraiser paper
loginHome.dont_have_ledger_wallet: Don't have the Ledger Tezos wallet app?
loginHome.connect_your_device: Please<1> connect your device</1>,<3> enter your pin</3>, and<5> open Tezos Wallet app</5>.

loginCreate.create_wallet_description: Your wallet information will be saved to your computer. It will be encrypted with a password that you set.
loginCreate.password_not_strong: Your password is not strong enough.

walletNodesRequired.close_wallet_description: Please close the wallet and edit 'extraResources/walletSettings.json' and open the wallet again.

errors.wrong_server: Something's wrong with our servers. Please delay further actions.
errors.wrong_network: It seems the Tezos node you are using is either stuck or on the wrong network. Please delay further actions.
errors.not_synced: It seems the Conseil server is not synced with the Tezos network. Please delay further actions.
